Readme

PhyloPlots: to plot phylogenetic trees and networks

overview

PhyloPlots has utilities to plot tree and network objects from PhyloNetworks using plotting back-ends like Gadfly, and through R via RCall.

examples

in the documentation for PhyloNetworks, see

  • basic examples here
  • examples to annotate edges here
